typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		type as string,
		properties as (linkedServiceName as (referenceName as string, type as string), annotations as string[], type as string, schema as (name as string, type as string)[], typeProperties as (schema as string, table as string)),
		etag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 foldDown(mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		type,
		properties,
		etag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
